Draggable card

Events

There are several events fired when you drag en element. Start is fired at the start of the drag, drag during the dragging process, and stop when dragging stops.

Draggable card

Start event fired 0 times

Drag event fired 0 times

Stop event fired 0 times

Handles

Handle and cancel options allow to enable dragging only when cursor is over a specific part of the draggable element. In following example the card can be dragged only when cursor is over card image.

Draggable card

Move mouse over image to drag

Button

Snap to element

Use snap option to snap the draggable element to other DOM element and snapTolerance option to define distance in pixels the draggable element must be from other element to enable snapping. In following example the card will snap to its container from distance of 50px.

Draggable card

Move mouse over image to drag
